song.title: Since April May Not March In June
song.info:
Ranked 4th out of 42 in the One Synth Challenge #68: Synth1 at kvraudio.com
written and mixed with renoise rewired to ableton live and 21 instances of "synth1", a freeware VSTi, as the only source of sound. ableton live limiter was used for minor dynamic processing on the master track.
external VST(fx) used: 1x TAL-DUB II, 5x epicVerb, 3x TAL-Reverb III, 1x Karma FX Deelay, 4x TDR Feedback Compressor, 3x Arguru Stardust, 1x Sanford Bass Tightener
host-internal DSP used: Filters, EQs, Lofimats, Maximizer, Multitap Delays, Gates, Exciters and a couple of meta devices (for automation purposes).
